review: The Logitech G PRO Hero Wired Gaming Mouse is an outstanding addition to my setup. The Hero 25K sensor delivers exceptional precision and responsiveness, making it a perfect choice for both gaming and everyday use. The build quality is top-notch, and the mouse feels durable and comfortable in hand. The customizable buttons and RGB lighting add a nice touch, allowing for personalization. The quick and hassle-free setup process was a breeze, and the mouse has significantly enhanced my gaming experience. Highly recommended!
